text: Anata gataga nani-sho ni ite mo, tatoe kengona koro ni ite mo, shi wa kanarazu yattekuru. Kare-ra wa koun ni aeba,`koreha arra no omoto karada.' To ii, mata sainan ni aeba,`kore wa anata (muhanmado) karada.' To iu. Itte yaru ga i. `Issai wa arra no omoto karadearu.' Ittai kono hito-tachi wa do shita nodearou ka. (Don'na) kotoba mo hotondo rikai shinai no ka
